mapper.select: select *, College.id cid , College.deleteStatus cdelete from teacher inner join college on collegeid = college.id where teacher.id = #{id} and teacher.deleteStatus=0 and college.deleteStatus=0

select *, College.id cid , College.deleteStatus cdelete from teacher inner join college on collegeid = college.id where teacher.teacherName = #{teacherName} and teacher.deleteStatus = 0 and college.deleteStatus = 0
select *, College.id cid , College.deleteStatus cdelete from teacher inner join college on collegeid = college.id

select *, College.id cid , College.deleteStatus cdelete from (((teacher inner join college on collegeid = college.id) inner join Course on teacherid = Teacher.id ) inner join Student_select_course on Course.id = Student_select_course.Courseid ) inner join Student_comment_course on Student_comment_course.selectid = Student_select_course.id group by Teacher.id order by sum(likeNumber) desc
mapper.update: update teacher set teacherName = #{teacherName}, gender = #{gender} , telPhone = #{telPhone} , email = #{email} , officeAddress = #{officeAddress} , collegeid = #{college}.getId() where id = #{id}
update teacher set deleteType = 1 where id = #{id}
